meanings.definition: The quality of being cautious or careful in actions or decisions.
meanings.sent1: Her cautiousnesses helped her avoid making mistakes.
meanings.sent2: His cautiousnesses were evident in the way he always double-checked his work.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's cautiousnesses in gathering nuts made the other animals chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The knight's cautiousnesses were his shield against the dragon's fiery breath.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's cautiousnesses in explaining the concept made it easy for the students to understand.

meanings.definition: The state of being cautious or showing caution.
meanings.sent1: The cautiousnesses of the hiker prevented any accidents on the trail.
meanings.sent2: In times of danger, his cautiousnesses kept him safe.
meanings.sent3: The cat's cautiousnesses around the new puppy was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The city's cautiousnesses in preparing for the storm saved many lives.
meanings.sent5: The driver's cautiousnesses on the icy road prevented any skidding.

meanings.definition: The act of being cautious or exercising caution.
meanings.sent1: Her cautiousnesses while crossing the street ensured her safety.
meanings.sent2: The doctor's cautiousnesses during surgery saved the patient's life.
meanings.sent3: The clown's cautiousnesses in juggling bananas made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The detective's cautiousnesses in solving the case led to the capture of the criminal.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's cautiousnesses in the jungle protected him from dangerous animals.
